attributes.action: Vote of No confidence in UK government
attributes.additional_details: The tories have constantly showed how inept they are to handle this pandemic. Give the public misleading information and repeatedly pass blame from themselves to the public for the rise in Covid cases. The British public deserve and demand a government who will take us through this crisis not cripple us. Boris Johnson and his party are not them. A General Election is needed to let the people decide the way forward
attributes.background: Throughout the global pandemic, the Conservative Government has failed the UK drastically. Constant U-turns on laws and restrictions. Enough is enough. The British people demand a Government who works for them not against.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

You may wish to sign this petition calling for a General Election:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314151
